verses.roman:
prabhura mahimā dekhi' loke camatkāra
prayāge prabhura līlā nāri varṇibāra

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mahimā—the greatness; dekhi'-seeing; loke—in all people; camatkāra—astonishment; prayāge—at Prayāga; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; līlā—the pastimes; nāri—I am not able; varṇibāra—to describe.
translation: Everyone was astounded to see the greatness of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Indeed, I cannot properly describe the pastimes of the Lord at Prayāga.
